Text: SAVE on your holiday giftsIMAGE IMAGE Mille de Fleur Arrangement Mille de FleurArrangement ShrekTM Movie and Plush Gift Set ShrekTM Movie and Plush Gift Set Dear Larry Connecting with loved ones is what makes the holidays such a special time of year Its also a great opportunity to reconnect with those you might have lost touch with and in the spirit of the holidays we are extending a special offer to our valued customers Now through December you can receive OFFon your next purchase of or moreUse promotion code REat checkout to receive your discount With our fresh flowers blooming plants gourmet items and unique gifts we have something for everyone on your holiday shopping list Over the last years we have built our business on the principles of delivering the finest products and services available Whether you click on wwwflowerscom visit a FLOWERSCOM store or just call our name FLOWERS we are here hours a day days a week to help you find a gift for any occasion Happy holidays and heres to being your trusted guide to giftingsm for another years and more IMAGE Jim McCann CEO FLOWERSCOM Call FLOWERS Click wwwflowerscom or Come in AOL Keyword flowers Shrek TM c DreamWorks LLC All Rights Reserved This email was sent to NRONCOM Register Now Electronic Greetings Gift Certificates Member Benefits Remove Me Contact Us Security Privacy Disclaimer Store Locator
